title: Sniper.Elite.3.(1.02).Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Sniper.Elite.3.Repack-R.G.Mechanics



Year: 2014
Genre: Action (Shooter) / 3D / 3rd Person / Stealth
Developer: Rebellion
Publisher: Rebellion
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng | Rus
Voice Language: Eng | Rus
Crack: RELOADED




System requirements:  
==========================================

Operating System: Microsoft Windows Vista (Service Pack 2) or Windows 7 (Service Pack 1)
or Windows 8 or Windows 8.1. Windows XP is NOT supported.
Processor: Dual-core CPU with SSE3 (Intel Pentium D 3GHz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 4200) or better
Memory: 2 GB
Video: Microsoft DirectX 10.0 compatible graphics card with 256 MB of memory
(NVIDIA GeForce 8800 series / ATI Radeon HD 3870) or better
DirectX: Version 11
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 10.0
Free space on hard disk: 29.5 GB

Game information:  
========================================

Action Sniper Elite 3 takes place during the Second World War.
In the role of American agent Charles Fairbairn you have to go
to North Africa to help the Allied forces to cope with the onslaught
of the Nazis. In parallel, the hero learns of a secret program to
develop tanks, realizing that Germany will be able to decide the outcome of the war.

The game is notable for non-linear gameplay, unfolding in an open area.
You wait for the fierce battle with melee weapons, as well as shooting
from distance. Bustling cities and remote villages - your invaluable
assistant in tactical planning and displacements. Updated camera gives
the ability to destroy armored vehicles and tanks with just one well-aimed
shot into the gas tank. Luggage X-Ray detailed manner will show you how the
bullets fired from the destroyed muscle and circulatory system. Moreover,
Sniper Elite 3 includes cooperative transmission mode and multiplayer.

Game Features:  
====================================:

Co-op mode that allows two players to try to unite their efforts for
the passage or story campaign mode Over Watch. Also available is the
newest and zudobrobitelny mode Survival Mission, in which you have
to break through tests prepared by the German Afrika Korps.

Multiplayer mode presented five options: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch,
Distance King, Team Distance King, No Cross. Last almost completely
copies Team Deathmatch, but the only difference is that the teams
are melee and unlikely.

Completely redesigned AI: enemies become much more smartest tactically,
so that each of your thoughtless action now can go sideways.

System X-Ray Kill-Cam - a kind of X-ray, clearly demonstrating the
damage you caused. You can see how fired bullet destroy bone,
muscle tissue, touches the internal organs and so on.

Advanced combat system. You will be given a detailed guide that
explains each type of weapon. So it will be easier to understand
which of them is better fit for the melee, and what - for long.
Modified stealth system will allow you to avoid many encounters
with the enemies: be smart, you can kill them before they can find you.


Repack Features:  
====================================

Sniper Elite 3
Game Version - v1.02
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice

Additions:  
========================

Target Hitler: Hunt the Grey Wolf
Allied Reinforcement Outfits Pack
Camouflage Weapons Pack
Hunter Weapons Pack
